attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It seems that the 'E-petition' scheme is yet another 'New Labour' spin/scam. I propose that the results of a 'sensible/reasonable' petition is automatically accepted by this 'unelected' government.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
